Property.name: autoClear
Property.comment: The number of milliseconds to wait after setting the status via {@link #setStatus} before automatically clearing the status text and icon (defaults to 5000).

Property.name: busyIconCls
Property.comment: The default {@link #iconCls} applied when calling {@link #showBusy} (defaults to 'x-status-busy').

Property.name: busyText
Property.comment: The default {@link #text} applied when calling {@link #showBusy} (defaults to 'Loading...').

Property.name: cls
Property.comment: The base class applied to the containing element for this component on render (defaults to 'x-statusbar')

Property.name: defaultIconCls
Property.comment: The default {@link #iconCls} value (see the iconCls docs for additional details about customizing the icon).

Property.name: iconCls
Property.comment: A CSS class that will be applied to the status element and is expected to provide a background image that will serve as the status bar icon (defaults to '').

Property.name: text
Property.comment: A string that will be rendered into the status element as the status message (defaults to '');
